trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.PageIndexChanged> event is raised when a button in the page selection element of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control is clicked.
For a list of initial property values for an instance of DataGridPageChangedEventArgs, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs"></xref> class.
Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs> class.
When an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs> is created by a call to this constructor, the following properties are initialized to the specified values.
The index of the page selected by the user from the page selection element of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
Gets the source of the command.
Use the CommandSource property to determine the source of the command that raised the event.

Because this event is raised only when a button in the page selection element of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control is clicked, the returned source is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object that represents the page selection element.
Gets the index of the page selected by the user in the page selection element of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
Use the NewPageIndex property to determine the index of the page selected by the user in the page selection element of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
This value is often used to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CurrentPageIndex%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control to display the selected page.
The index of the page selected by the user in the page selection element of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
